name: lambdanodetypescript
description: Example Lambda with Node and Typescript

scripts.copy-modules: rm -rf ./node_modules && npm install --only=prod && cp -r ./node_modules ./dist/node_modules && echo "Modules copied"

scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run copy-modules && npm run package
